channel.title: [Class suggestion] Spy/Snoop (BD/Unseen Social)
channel.description:
For those who liked the old noble here is the result of a mix of suggestions that have the spying theme:
Spy BD social
Passive ability 1: Voice recognition - Chats are never anonymous to you Passive ability 2: Insider - During votes you know who is voting for who as it happens.
Day Ability: Lip read - Hear all whispers to and from your target (Unlimited)
Night Ability 1: Intersept - Reveal to yourself all notifications your target got as a result of someone else's Ability's. Does not reveal conversion. (Unlimited) Night Ability 2: Head count - Reveal to yourself how meny live BD and Neutrals there are (1 use)
Snoop - Unseen Social Passive ability 1: Voice recognition - Chats are never anonymous to you. Passive ability 2: Insider - During votes you know who is voting for who as it happens.
Day Ability: Lip read - Hear all whispers to and from your target (Unlimited)
Night Ability 1: Intersept - Reveal to yourself all notifications your target got as a result of someone else's Ability's. (Unlimited)

item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
For those who liked the old noble here is the result of a mix of suggestions that have the spying theme:

Spy BD social

Passive ability 1: Voice recognition - Chats are never anonymous to you
Passive ability 2: Insider - During votes you know who is voting for who as it happens.

Day Ability: Lip read - Hear all whispers to and from your target (Unlimited)

Night Ability 1: Intersept - Reveal to yourself all notifications your target got as a result of someone else’s Ability’s. Does not reveal conversion. (Unlimited)
Night Ability 2: Head count - Reveal to yourself how meny live BD and Neutrals there are (1 use)

Snoop - Unseen Social
Passive ability 1: Voice recognition - Chats are never anonymous to you.
Passive ability 2: Insider - During votes you know who is voting for who as it happens.
